snippet: The arrests of three politiqueras, or campaign runners, who are often hired to gather votes in contested races, have become a tricky issue for elected officials in the Rio Grande Valley.
abstract: Case again three campaign runners in Donna, Tex, has drawn attention to the common practice of hiring people to gather votes in contested races; many elected officials in the Rio Grande Valley area have found themselves having to address the issue and their past involvement with politiqueras, as the runners are called.
lead_paragraph: The arrests of three politiqueras, or campaign runners, who are often hired to gather votes in contested races, have become a tricky issue for elected officials in the Rio Grande Valley.

headline.main: Texas Vote-Buying Case Casts Glare on Tradition of Election Day Goads
headline.print_headline: Texas Vote-Buying Case Casts Glare on Tradition of Election Day Goads
